{"id":917487134,"question_id":2663,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"12Â months","timestamp":1679151640,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/917487134/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Distribute Money to Maximum Children","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int distMoney(int n, int children) {\n        if(n < children) return -1;\n        if(n > 8 * children) return children - 1;\n        if(n == 8 * children) return children;\n        int ans = 0;\n        n -= children;\n        ans = n / 7, n %= 7;\n        if(n == 3 && ans && children - ans == 1) ans--;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"distribute-money-to-maximum-children","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
